dcterms:creator: Hugh Durrant-Whyte
David Rye
Eduardo Nebot
dcterms:description: The NDT algorithm is used for localization in autonomous vehicles, applying a scan matching technique over 3D map data and 3D point cloud data, achieving high precision in localization.
dcterms:title: NDT algorithm (Normal Distributions Transform)

dcterms:creator: G. He
S. Ma
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on short-term traffic volume prediction using wavelet analysis, contributing to the understanding of traffic flow dynamics.
dcterms:title: Traffic Flow Prediction Techniques

dcterms:creator: Dervis Karaboga
Bahriye Basturk
dcterms:description: The Artificial Bee Colony (ABC) algorithm is utilized for optimization tasks, inspired by the foraging behavior of honey bees.
dcterms:title: Artificial Bee Colony (ABC) Algorithm

dcterms:creator: A. Boudguiga
A. Boulanger
P. Chiron
W. Klaudel
H. Labiod
J.-C. Seguy
dcterms:description: VeRA is a method for risk analysis in autonomous vehicles, considering multiple factors to assess risks associated with vehicle operations.
dcterms:title: VeRA (Vehicles Risk Analysis)

dcterms:description: The ISO 26262 process is a standard for ensuring functional safety in automotive systems, particularly for autonomous vehicles.
dcterms:title: ISO 26262 Process

dcterms:creator: A. Roy
D. S. Kim
K. S. Trivedi
dcterms:description: This dataset discusses cybersecurity risks in autonomous vehicles, focusing on attack countermeasure trees to unify attack and defense constructs.
dcterms:title: Cybersecurity Risks in Autonomous Vehicles

dcterms:creator: J.-F. Bonnefon
A. Shariff
I. Rahwan
dcterms:description: This dataset explores ethical issues surrounding autonomous vehicles, particularly the moral dilemmas faced in decision-making scenarios.
dcterms:title: Ethical Issues in Autonomous Vehicles

dcterms:creator: Takeyoshi Imai
dcterms:description: This dataset addresses legal issues related to autonomous driving technology, focusing on current conditions and challenges in Japan.
dcterms:title: Legal Issues in Autonomous Vehicles
